short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep satsang at the center of your life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses the new tab to surface latest vicharan photos of Guruhari Mahant Swami Maharaj. It aims to help you attach to the Satpurush by remembering him in every action that we take during our day.
